Comments_List: Empirical analysis of international trade data, EK model, Value added trade
Small class size was inappropriate for lecture style teaching, but approach was more interactive towards the end
Guillermo has very organized and informative slides- it makes the class very engaging and straightforward/clear.
Yes. If you are interested in international trade, this is a great class to take. It focuses on empirical research (we replicated many toy models and analyzed several papers).
Definitely! Guillermo is an excellent instructor, this class is great even for non-econ majors. Take it if you had any interest at all in international trade.
